name: American Kush
description: American Kush, by Alphakronik Genes (AKG), is a 70/30 indica-dominant combination of Pre-98 Bubba Kush and Sin City Kush. It is a robust strain with large bulbous colas that deliver the profound, relaxing body effects that have made Kush strains so popular. With a smooth palate of flavors ranging from fresh lemon to spicy notes of lavender and coffee, American Kush is a delightful answer to muscle spasms, chronic pain, and nausea.
descriptionPlain: American Kush, by Alphakronik Genes (AKG), is a 70/30 indica-dominant combination of Pre-98 Bubba Kush and Sin City Kush. It is a robust strain with large bulbous colas that deliver the profound, relaxing body effects that have made Kush strains so popular. With a smooth palate of flavors ranging from fresh lemon to spicy notes of lavender and coffee, American Kush is a delightful answer to muscle spasms, chronic pain, and nausea.

highlightedReviews.text:
Perfect pain relief and bedtime smoke 
Definitely Indica dominant don't smoke if you have daily tasks to accomplish
It's amazingly smooth, it smells great when it burns. Very sweet taste that quenches your thirst in a way. Very mellow high for a nice relaxing night after a long days work.

articles.title: 6 Cannabis Strains to Help You Celebrate the 4th of July
articles.author: Sara Dilley
articles.text:
Independence Day is just one day away! At this point, you’ve already cleaned out your local grocery store’s chips, hot dogs, watermelons, and possibly several cases of beer. Your fireworks have been acquired. Your friends have been invited over. You’re ready for the weekend. But which strains will you consume?
You can’t just celebrate our nation’s birth with any old strain, and why would you when there are so many festive options to choose from! Whether you’re looking for an uplifting strain or something a little more mellow, these patriotic strains are just the ticket to ring in America’s 239th birthday!
Spirit of ‘76

Nothing better to get you into the spirit of the holiday than Spirit of ’76! This hybrid hails from Denver, Colorado and boasts a relaxed, uplifted high that will give you the energy you’ll need to make it through a long day of celebration. It’s also particularly well-suited to stimulating appetites, which will give you an added boost to eat that extra hot dog!
Liberty Haze

This High Times Cannabis Cup winner offers a refreshing summer lime taste and has lab-tested THC results as high as 25%. An uplifting, energetic hybrid offers heady, cerebral effects that are great at combating anxiety and depression to help ensure your spirits are lifted the whole day through. This strain promises an excellent day of celebration, with liberty and justice for all.
Danky Doodle

Say what you will about the cannabis industry and puns, we’re still suckers for good wordplay, and Danky Doodle is just that. Originally named Double D in reference to its large buds (we’ll let you make the connection there), the breeder decided to rename the strain to Danky Doodle so as not to confuse it with Double Dutch. This strain provides the full body relief you’ve come to expect with indicas, but it has a lighter, uplifted high then most. It’s the perfect option to provide the pain relief you need without locking you to your couch during the day’s festivities.
American Kush

God bless America(n Kush)! This indica boasts a pungent, skunky flavor profile with hints of lemon to spicy notes of lavender and coffee. Patients will benefit from the pain-relieving properties that are known to treat muscle spasms, chronic pain, and nausea. Recreational consumers will love its relaxed, euphoric high. And if you’re looking for a little help eating that last piece of watermelon, the hunger-inducing properties are just for you!
Cherry Bomb

Would it really be the 4th of July without some fireworks? This hybrid isn’t quite as explosive as the firecracker that shares its name, but its happy, uplifted, energetic effects will ensure you’re ready to enjoy the magnificent explosions you’ll no doubt witness. Within moments of your first puff, you’ll feel the strong and active, mentally alert effects that will eventually give way to a smooth, more focused state that will keep you going through the show.
Presidential OG

Once the festivities conclude and you’re looking to settle in for a good night’s sleep, Presidential OG is just the strain for you. Almost purely indica, this hard-hitting cross between Bubble Gum and OG Kush will melt your cares away, lulling you into slumber almost immediately (but not before you have a moment to enjoy the intense citrus-pine aroma this dreamy strain omits).
There you have it, folks! These strains bleed red, white, and blue, and are everything you’ll need to usher your way through this 4th of July. From all of us at Leafly to you, Happy Independence Day!

articles.title: Are You Ready for Some Football? Recipes and Strain Suggestions for the Big Game
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Well folks, the “we have to call it the ‘Big Game’ because that other name is trademarked but we all know what the ‘Big Game’ actually refers to” is taking place this Sunday in sunny Houston, Texas. For those of you who are football fans, absurdly expensive commercial fans, or just fans of hanging out with your friends so you can chow down on food and vape your favorite strain while they shake their fists and scream obscenities at the television, here’s a list of some cannabis-infused recipes and strains to make Sunday even more “Super.”
Cannabis-Infused Recipes for the Big Football Game
1. Cannabis-Infused Chipotle Avocado Baked Macaroni and Cheese

Who doesn’t love mac and cheese? This homey dish of cannabis-infused cheesy, creamy deliciousness will warm the bellies of your friends as they watch the Patriots and Falcons face off.
2. Cannabis-Infused Cucumber Avocado Dip

Dips are their own genre of food when it comes to watching sports. This recipe for infused cucumber avocado dip is deceptively healthy but definitely delicious.
3. Cannabis-Infused Guacamole

Speaking of dips, guacamole is a must-have at any championship viewing party. But what’s better than guacamole? Cannabis-infused guacamole, of course!
4. Cannabis-Infused Hummus

Three infused dip recipes? Why the heck not? Pair this infused hummus with some pita chips or crudité, or smear it onto chicken feta sliders.
5. Cannabis-Infused Pesto Pizza

Whip up a few pizzas with different topping combinations for instant viewing party MVP status.
6. Cannabis-Infused Coleslaw

If you’re going the BBQ route, this side dish of cannabis-infused coleslaw makes a pairing as perfect as Brady and Belichick.
7. Cannabis-Infused Bacon

Honestly, it doesn’t matter what you do with this – it’s cannabis-infused bacon, for crying out loud. Wrap it around dates and roast them so they look like little footballs (laces out!). Make some bacon cheeseburgers. Or just put out a tray of cannabis-infused bacon – after all, bacon is pretty damn delicious.
Note: Dosing homemade edibles can be tricky (click here to learn why), so the best way to test for potency is to start with one portion of a serving, wait one to two hours, then make an informed decision on whether to consume more. Always dose carefully and listen to your body, and never drive under the influence of cannabis.
Cannabis Strains to Pick Up for the Big Game
1. Peaches and Cream

With this guaranteed good-mood hybrid strain, notes reminiscent of sweet Georgia peaches come through in a flavor profile that Atlanta fans will absolutely appreciate.
2. American Kush

For Patriots fans, this star-spangled indica delivers happy, tingly effects to match how you’ll feel if Brady and Belichick do it again.
3. Southern Lights

For all you Falcons fans, this smoothly smokable sativa relaxes your body and sharpens your mind, letting you take it all in from the comfort of any given couch.
4. Kaboom

Whenever anyone takes a big hit, take an equally big hit of this lemony sativa.
5. Super Silver Haze

Silver is a tertiary color for both teams headed to Houston, and come Sunday those silver accents are going to be looking pretty super. Even better, this popular sativa will deliver the energy needed to pump you up for the opening kickoff.
6. Champagne Kush

Treachoself! When the fourth quarter clock reaches zero and the Gatorade is dumped on the winning coach, bust out this uplifting flowery hybrid and celebrate in style.

Short flowering (6-7 weeks)
	AKG recommends a feeding schedule high in nitrogen and reduced levels of phosphorus and potassium
	Able to handle higher temperatures
